TypeSignature.Value: public class Frame : System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl, System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild, System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext

Public Class Frame Inherits ContentControl Implements IAddChild, IUriContext
public ref class Frame : System::Windows::Controls::ContentControl, System::Windows::Markup::IAddChild, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type Frame = class inherit ContentControl interface IAddChild interface IUriContext

summary.span: 框架是一种支持导航的内容控件。

span.span: Frame is a content control that supports navigation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供导航到和显示内容的功能的内容控件。 is a content control that provides the ability to navigate to and display content. 与其他控件和元素一样，可在其他内容中托管。 can be hosted within other content, as with other controls and elements. > [!CAUTION] > 当控件导航到 HTML 内容时 ，控件在内部实例化本机 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件。 When the control navigates to HTML content, the control internally instantiates the native WebBrowser ActiveX control. WPF 通过将功能控件应用于 WebBrowser ActiveX 控件来启用安全功能。WPF enables security features by applying feature controls to the WebBrowser ActiveX control. 应用的功能控件在 Xbap 和独立应用程序方面有所不同。The feature controls that are applied differ for XBAPs and stand-alone applications. 某些应用程序应该应用其他功能控制，以防止恶意内容运行。Some applications should apply additional feature controls to prevent malicious content from running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[安全性（WPF）](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md)和[WebBrowser 控件概述和教程](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388)中的 "WebBrowser 控件和功能控件" 一节。For more information, see the "WebBrowser Control and Feature Controls" section in [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md) and [WebBrowser Control Overviews and Tutorials](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=179388). 内容可以是任何类型的 .NET Framework 对象和 HTML 文件。Content can be any type of .NET Framework object and HTML files. 但一般情况下，页面是打包内容以进行导航的首选方式（请参阅）。In general, however, pages are the preferred the way to package content for navigation (see ). 可以通过将属性设置为所需内容的 URI 来导航至内容。Content can be navigated to by setting the property with the URI for the desired content. 此外，还可以使用方法的以下重载之一导航到内容：Additionally, content can be navigated to by using one of the following overloads of the method: - - 当内容通过 URI 导航到时， 将返回包含内容的对象。When content is navigated to by URI, returns an object that contains the content. 或者，可以通过使用接受对象的方法重载之一来导航到内容：Alternatively, content can be navigated to by using one of the method overloads that accepts an object: - - 导航的生存期可通过以下事件进行跟踪：The lifetime of a navigation can be tracked through the following events: - - - - - - - 并非每次发生导航时都会引发所有事件;引发的事件集由发生的导航类型（内容或内容片段）以及导航完成方式（取消、停止或失败）决定。Not all events are raised each time that a navigation occurs; the set of events that are raised is determined by the type of navigation that occurs (content or content fragment) and how the navigation completes (canceled, stopped, or failed). 下图说明了这些事件将激发的顺序：The following figure illustrates the sequence in which these events will fire: ![页面导航流程图](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "页面导航流程图")![Page navigation flow chart](~/add/media/navigationoverviewfigure11.png "Page navigation flow chart") 在导航过程中或导航后，提供有关要导航到的内容的信息，包括要导航到的内容的 uri （）、当前内容的 uri （），以及包含导航到的内容（）。During or after a navigation, provides information about the content that is being navigated to, including the URI of the content being navigated to (), the URI of the current content (), and an object that contains the content that was navigated to (). 导航到内容时， 会将导航记录为导航历史记录中的条目。When content is navigated to, records the navigation as an entry in navigation history. 当出现新的导航时，通过调用方法或通过在前进导航历史记录中通过调用导航到某个条目来向后导航历史记录中添加一个条目。An entry is added to back navigation history when either a new navigation occurs, by calling the method, or by navigating to an entry in forward navigation history, by calling . 通过在后退导航历史记录中通过调用来向后导航历史记录中添加一个条目。An entry is added to forward navigation history by navigating to an entry in back navigation history, by calling . 和报告后退和前进导航历史记录中是否存在条目。 and report whether there are entries in back and forward navigation history, respectively. 第一次从另一段内容导航到一个内容时， 将自动显示允许用户在导航历史记录中向后和向前导航的导航用户界面。The first time that one piece of content is navigated to from another piece of content, automatically displays a navigation UI that allows users to navigate back and forward through navigation history. 可以通过设置属性来配置显示导航 UI 的时间。You can configure when the navigation UI is shown by setting the property. 默认情况下 ，仅当找不到具有其自己的导航历史记录的父导航器（、）时，才会使用其自己的导航历史记录。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigator (, ) with its own navigation history cannot be found. 这意味着，框架的导航历史记录项与父导航器的导航历史记录项从不。This means that navigation history entries for the frame are mingled with navigation history entries for the parent navigator. 若要指定管理自己的导航历史记录，请将属性设置为。To specify that a manages its own navigation history, set the property to . 后退导航历史记录中的最新条目可通过调用删除。The most recent entry in back navigation history can be removed by calling . 不会在导航历史记录中存储内容对象的实例。 does not store an instance of a content object in navigation history. 相反， 每次使用导航历史记录导航到内容对象时，都将创建该对象的新实例。Instead, creates a new instance of the content object each time it is navigated to by using navigation history. 此行为旨在避免在将大量内容导航到时消耗过多的内存。This behavior is designed to avoid excessive memory consumption when large numbers and large pieces of content are being navigated to. 因此，不会从一个导航到下一个导航来记住内容的状态。Consequently, the state of the content is not remembered from one navigation to the next. 不过，WPF 提供了多种方法，你可以通过这些方法在导航历史记录中存储部分内容的状态。However, WPF provides several techniques by which you can store a state for a piece of content in navigation history. 使用，还可以记住单个页面实例的多个状态集。Using , you can also remember multiple sets of state for a single page instance. ## 自定义框架控件Customizing the Frame Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 system.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态，请参阅[框架样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Frame Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/frame-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建一个简单的控件，并使用属性指定要从 URI 加载的初始源内容。The following example shows how to create a simple control and specify initial source content to load from a URI using the property. [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml1)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml2)] [!code-xaml[FrameSnippets#SetFrameSourceXAML3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameSnippets/CS/MainWindow.xaml#setframesourcexaml3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership JournalOwnership { System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::JournalOwnership value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置 是负责管理自己的导航历史记录，还是将导航历史记录的管理工作交给父导航器 (、) 负责。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a is responsible for managing its own navigation history, or yields navigation history management to a parent navigator (, ).

value.span: 一个 值，该值指定 是否管理自己的日记。

span.span: A value that specifies whether manages its own journal.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下 ，仅当找不到具有其自己的日记的父导航宿主（，）时，才会使用其自己的导航历史记录（例如，如果托管在由承载的内容中）。By default, will use its own navigation history only if a parent navigation host (, ) with its own journal cannot be found (for example, if a is hosted in content that is hosted by a ). 若要强制管理自己的导航历史记录， 请将设置为。To force to manage its own navigation history, set to . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个配置为使用自己的导航历史记录的。The following example illustrates a that is configured to use its own navigation history. [!code-xaml[FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample#SetJournalOwnershipProperty](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameJournalOwnershipSnippetSample/CS/HomePage.xaml#setjournalownershipproperty)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请参阅 。See . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何导航到对象所包含的内容。The following example shows how to navigate to content that is contained by an object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于支持托管内容的导航。 uses to support navigation for hosted content. 对于承载的代码，用于获取对的引用。 is useful for code that hosts a to get a reference to the . 承载的内容（ 如）应使用或来获取对的引用。Content that is hosted by a , such as , should use or to get a reference to the . > [!NOTE] > 不返回与调用 和传递相同的引用。 does not return a reference to the same as calling and passing does. 前者返回 由拥有的， 而后者将为导航宿主的导航宿主返回，该定位于所承载的内容。 The former returns the that is owned by the while the latter returns the for the navigation host that navigated to the content in which the is hosted. 下面的代码演示了不同之处。The following code demonstrates the differences. [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode1)] [!code-csharp[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#nsframediffcode2)] [!code-vb[NSGNSvsFNSSnippets#NSFrameDiffCODE2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/NSGNSvsFNSSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#nsframediffcode2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility NavigationUIVisibility { System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility get(); void set(System::Windows::Navigation::NavigationUIVisibility value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 何时可以显示其导航 UI。

span.span: Gets or sets when the can show its navigation UI.

value.span: 一个值，该值指定何时可以显示其导航 UI。

span.span: A value that specifies when the can show its navigation UI.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 在将第一项添加到导航历史记录中时，将自动显示其导航 UI。By default, a shows its navigation UI automatically when the first entry is added to navigation history. 导航 UI 随后仍保持可见，后退或前进导航按钮将被适当地启用或禁用，以反映后退和前进导航历史记录中的条目数。The navigation UI subsequently remains visible, with the back or forward navigation buttons becoming appropriately enabled or disabled to reflect the number of entries in back and forward navigation history. 可以通过设置来确保导航 UI 始终可见：You can ensure that navigation UI is always visible by setting: 1. 至 to 2. 至 to 如果要隐藏导航 UI，则设置为。You set to if you want to hide the navigation UI. 这种情况可能是因为导航 ui 对您在中显示的内容没有意义，或者您提供了自己的导航 ui。This might be the case when navigation UI doesn't make sense with the content you are displaying from a , or because you are providing your own navigation UI. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过将设置 为来确保的导航 chrome 始终可见。The following example demonstrates how to make sure the navigation chrome of a is always visible by setting to . [!code-csharp[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-vb[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#setnavigationuivisibility)] [!code-xaml[FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets#SetNavigationUIVisibility](~/samples/snippets/xaml/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FrameNavigationUIVisibilitySnippets/XAML/Window1.xaml#setnavigationuivisibility)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool SandboxExternalContent { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.SandboxExternalContent : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 是否在一个部分信任的安全沙盒（具有默认的 权限集）中隔离外部 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] 内容。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a isolates external [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] content within a partial trust security sandbox (with the default permission set).

value.span: 如果在一个部分信任的安全沙盒中隔离内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if content is isolated within a partial trust security sandbox; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外部内容是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]应用程序不包含在资源文件或内容文件中的内容（请参阅[WPF 应用程序资源、内容和数据文件](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)）。External content is [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] content that is not included with an application as either a resource file or a content file (see [WPF Application Resource, Content, and Data Files](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/wpf-application-resource-content-and-data-files.md)). 如果 为`true`，并且的内容的源是外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件，则会将内容加载到仅限默认`Internet`权限集的部分信任的安全沙盒中。When is `true`, and the source for the content of the is an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, the content is loaded into a partial trust security sandbox that is limited to the default `Internet` permission set. 外部内容随后将加载到单独的进程中。The external content is subsequently loaded into a separate process. 因此，外部内容将被隔离，并且无权访问应用程序范围的资源，例如资源字典（请参阅）。As a result, the external content becomes isolated and does not have access to application-scope resources, such as resource dictionaries (see ). > [!NOTE] > 仅在将属性设置为外部[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]文件的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]时包含外部内容。 will only contain external content when the property is set to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] for an external [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file. 使用属性提供的内容被视为内部内容，并且随后不会隔离。 content that is provided using the property is considered internal content and, subsequently, is not isolated. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

exception.span: 当应用程序在部分信任的环境中执行时，将设置 。

span.span: is set when an application is executing in partial trust.
